body: If anyone knows how to put screenshots of stuff here please tell me! I DONT WANNA USE IMIGR
body_tagged: If anyone knows how to put screenshots of stuff here please tell me! I DONT WANNA USE IMIGR
title: I NEED HELPERS!

replies.body:
If you don't want to use imgur, you may use gyazo.

Please refer to this thread to figure out how to add images or screenshots: http://avicus.net/forums/75853dd76

Take care!
